properties.displayName: Visual Studio Code Tunnel Remote File Creation
properties.query:
DeviceFileEvents
| where InitiatingProcessFolderPath contains "\\servers\\Stable-" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\server\\node.exe" and FolderPath contains "\\.vscode-server\\data\\User\\History\\"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the creation of file by the "node.exe" process in the ".vscode-server" directory. Could be a sign of remote file creation via VsCode tunnel feature
